text:
Having lived near Pasir Ris for several years, I never knew about this restaurant until a friend introduced it to us.

I really like the ambiance here‚Äîvery peaceful. Although the restaurant is next to a road and condominiums, it feels like a world of its own, free from noise.
The staff are also very polite and friendly.

The biggest surprise was that even without air conditioning, the place is pleasantly cool, making it comfortable even for someone like me who dislikes the heat.

Food: The food quality is decent overall and quite satisfying. We tried half a dozen oysters- not the most flavorful or creamy variety, but they were fresh. The steak preparation was also good, though it lacked a bit of beefy flavor.

Entrainment: The restaurant even has a dartboard for diners to enjoy. At just $2 per game, it was a fun activity for kids.

Although the prices are on the higher side, the unique environment makes it a nice option for festive celebrations or special occasions.

Pet friendly restaurant.
Food is always yummy especially Pizza and Houfan. We love the way they make our meals time pleasant with good customer service. Family/Couple/Gathering.. all suitable.
Very good food and nice to be there in the evening for dinner. Food on the pricey side but service and quality makes up for that.

We enjoyed great service from the team at Bark Cafe. The staff were very friendly and fast in their service. Good was very good too.

Just be prepared to pay a pretty penny. üòÑ

Taste:
Fried Chicken wings 5/5
(Juicy, well fried, and the chilli is super killerüëç)

Fried tofu 5/5
(Perfectly fried but tender and soft inside. It's one of the best I've ever had)

Satay 4/5
(Thick tender cuts with good sauce)

Spaghetti Carbonara 4/5

Hokkien Prawn mee 4/5
Surprisingly good

Seafood horfun 3/5

Chicken pizza 2/5
(Forgettable)

Spam fries 2/5

Seafood Aglio Olio 3/5
Not too oily

Near our new home. Chill and secluded cafe with very decent food. We ordered 6 oysters and the promotion set - 1 pork knuckles with 2 pints of beers. Very full already shared by 2 adults. The pork knuckles was very crispy indeed much to exceeding my expectation. Friendly and helpful servers. Clean tables and environment. Big TV screens for soccer lovers. Have darts and fish tank to view. If you sit near entrance, you get to enjoy the wonderful lightings by the tree. If you bring your dogs or pets, I think it's perfect environment. Heard chicken wings is signature for side dish next time will try definitely.

Cheers happy sat and weekend to all.
